question: In the preparation of sodium fusion extract, the purpose of fusing organic compound with a piece of sodium metal is to
choices: Convert the organic compound into vapour state
Convert the elements of the compound from covalent form to ionic form
Convert the elements of the compound from ionic form to covalent form
Decrease the melting point of the compound
explanation: Fusion with sodium converts covalent elements (N, S, Halogens) present in organic compounds into ionic sodium salts (NaCN, <katex>$Na_2S$</katex>, NaX) for detection.
